headline: Jim Cramer Says Wall Street Is “Falling Back in Love With the New Ulta”
summary: Ulta Beauty, Inc. (NASDAQ:ULTA) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently looked at. Cramer called it one of his “favorite” companies during the episode, as he commented: “I always keep an eye on the new high list to understand what’s working.
